title: CHoPs
description: The adventures of two California Helicopter Patrol officers.
quote: Man, why you choppies always spoiling my fun?
creator: Rick Rotor
altHero: two police choppers flying between skyscrapers
alt1: two choppers talking with a red sports car
alt3: Studio 4x4 skyscraper on fire with billowing smoke
alt4: a red car dangles from a cable and talks with a chopper nearby
